mapper.select: SELECT r.id, j.job_name, st.status, r.params, r.created_at FROM runs r JOIN rq_statuses st ON r.status_id = st.id JOIN jobs j ON r.job_id = j.id WHERE st.status = 'NEW'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO runs ( job_id, status_id, params) VALUES ((SELECT j.id from jobs j where #{rq.jobName} = j.job_name), (SELECT st.id from rq_statuses st where #{rq.jobStatus} = st.status), #{rq.jobParams})
